events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred yesterday involving their vehicle colliding with another on the highway.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident following the review of the initial incident description and keywords provided.
An insurance agent specializing in auto collisions was assigned promptly to handle the customer's accident claim with care and attention.
The claim acknowledgment was sent to the customer confirming receipt and that the investigation process will begin shortly.
Request for accident-related documents such as police report, photos of vehicle damage, and repair estimates was communicated clearly.
The customer submitted all requested documents including official police report, images of the damage, and repair shop estimates promptly.
Investigation into the cause and liability of the vehicle collision began immediately following document review and agent evaluation.
The investigation concluded with findings that support the customer's claim with no evidence of policy violations or fault.
A settlement amount was proposed to cover all verified damages to the vehicle and related costs, offered fairly to the customer.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely investigation and the fair settlement proposal received from the insurer.
Final approval was granted for the claim, confirming that all damages incurred in the auto accident will be covered as per policy.
Insurance payment was issued promptly to the customerâ€™s account to cover repair costs and any additional approved expenses.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after full settlement and payment completion, with confirmation sent to the customer.
